name: Toykio Drift
description:
We literaly change the proyect hours before deadline, so we made what we could.

The game: you are a toy car and you are driving away from a teddybear with an axe and a remote control car.

Controls:

wasd : to rewind
space : to start driving
ad: to drive

Models : Jorge Andrés Hernandez García
Programing: Eduardo Sierra Yescas
